coding_practice.title: Maximum Length of Repeated Subarray
coding_practice.description: Given two integer arrays nums1 and nums2, return the maximum length of a subarray that appears in both arrays.

examples.explanation: The repeated subarray with maximum length is [3,2,1].
The repeated subarray with maximum length is [0,0,0,0,0].

coding_practice.explanation: 1. 建立 dp 二維陣列，dp[i][j] 表示 nums1 前 i 個元素與 nums2 前 j 個元素結尾的最大共同子陣列長度。\n2. 遍歷 i 和 j，如果 nums1[i-1] == nums2[j-1]，則 dp[i][j] = dp[i-1][j-1] + 1。\n3. 每次更新 max_len，最後返回最大值。
